Welcome to the Art of Content Marketing!

A course on how to ideate, create and support marketing or product copy
Get started now

Writing made easy

This course is built on the idea that if you can speak, you can write. It aims to demystify this craft and make it effortless for everyone.

Result-driven approach

In the 21st century, good content isn’t what sounds poetic, but what works. The Art of Content Marketing champions a result-driven approach focused on impacting the bottom line.

Meet the author

Hi, I’m Sandra. I have 5+ years of experience establishing content marketing as a major growth channel for companies. I am currently leading the Paid Content Marketing team at Blinkist, an app that I saw grow to more than 13 million users. Over my career, I’ve figured out exactly how to get through to people–all of which will be shared in this course.

What will you learn?

The course

The Art of Content Marketing consists of 8 chapters and is laid out in a PDF course booklet. New content will be added frequently, for which customers will receive updated versions. The course illustrates the challenges of copywriting and ways to tackle them through case studies and exercises. By the end of the course, you will feel 100% confident in creating solid copy and content strategies.
